resources.string: The camera can now be safely ejected
To assist in troubleshooting, the APP needs to write logs under Download/simpleuvccamera/logs. You can create issues with these logs as attachments to github (github.com/tsinglink/uvccamera)
The log was saved in Download/simpleuvccamera/logs. If you find bugs, you can create an issue with these logs as attachments. (github.com/tsinglink/uvccamera)
